segments.text: Good morning . Thank you for the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Now , do you prefer working with others or flying solo ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , what is most important to you in a job ? Do you need job security or professional growth and a chance to advance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you be able to relocate ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are your annual salary requirements ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need at least 75,000 per year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll keep that in mind . Thank you for coming in today . We ’ ll be in touch .
segments.speaker: S2
